sn51.21:1.2: “Pubbeva me, bhikkhave, sambodha anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi:
sn51.21:1.3: ‘ko nu kho maggo, ka patipada iddhipadabhavanaya’ti?
sn51.21:1.6: iti me chando na ca atilino bhavissati, na ca atippaggahito bhavissati, na ca ajjhattam sankhitto bhavissati, na ca bahiddha vikkhitto bhavissati.
sn51.21:1.8: yatha pure tatha paccha, yatha paccha tatha pure;
sn51.21:1.9: yatha adho tatha uddham, yatha uddham tatha adho;
sn51.21:1.10: yatha diva tatha rattim, yatha rattim tatha diva.
sn51.21:1.11: Iti vivatena cetasa apariyonaddhena sappabhasam cittam bhaveti.
sn51.21:1.15: iti me vimamsa na ca atilina bhavissati, na ca atippaggahita bhavissati, na ca ajjhattam sankhitta bhavissati, na ca bahiddha vikkhitta bhavissati.
sn51.21:1.17: yatha pure tatha paccha, yatha paccha tatha pure;
sn51.21:1.18: yatha adho tatha uddham, yatha uddham tatha adho;
sn51.21:1.19: yatha diva tatha rattim yatha rattim tatha diva’—
sn51.21:1.20: iti vivatena cetasa apariyonaddhena sappabhasam cittam bhaveti.
sn51.21:2.1: Evam bhavitesu kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu catusu iddhipadesu evam bahulikatesu anekavihitam iddhividham paccanubhoti—ekopi hutva bahudha hoti, bahudhapi hutva eko hoti …pe… yava brahmalokapi kayena vasam vatteti.
sn51.21:2.2: Evam bhavitesu kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu catusu iddhipadesu evam bahulikatesu, asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati”ti.
